entries.title: SANGS core policy
entries.content: SANGS does not appraise, buy, or sell; we grade and certify only.

entries.title: SANGS intake checklist
entries.content: (revised) Add courier insurance evidence (proof) when value exceeds R50,000.

entries.title: Return logistics
entries.content: After QC, arrange courier return and update tracking.

entries.title: SANGS intake checklist
entries.content: Full name, email, phone, city/region, type (coins/notes), approx qty. If courier: pickup address, pickup date, time window, ready-by time, insurance, declared value, special handling.

entries.title: Return logistics
entries.content: After QC, arrange courier return and update tracking.

entries.title: SANGS courier intake fields
entries.content:
Collect pickup address, pickup date, time window, and ready-by time.
Include insurance required (Y/N), declared value (ZAR), special handling, and building access notes.

entries.title: SANGS turnaround times
entries.content: Standard: 10–15 business days; Express: 3–5; Super Express: 1–2.
